name: Chain Collar Square 3
description:
part of the series "Chain Collar Square 1, 2 & 3"

the first series of a bigger collection of purely digital black and white square format nude works

3000x3000 pixels
Edition of 10 each

fragmented close-up bits of skin and metal. the works focus on the human body, revealing the relation between its delicate and fierce form. the interaction with different objects, textures and light elevate the body to a proud state of acceptance and celebration of the honest self, beyond the need to control space and time.

this was produced in 2021 for nft release with material from a 2016 photo session in berlin

©2021 Luc Berger
